## UserAgent.start() method

Start the user agent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
start(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

## Remarks

Resolves if transport connects, otherwise rejects.

## Example


```ts
userAgent.start()
  .then(() => {
    // userAgent.isConnected() === true
  })
  .catch((error: Error) => {
    // userAgent.isConnected() === false
  });

```
